item.title: Sterlite Technologies share price slumps over 7% despite stock market rally. Here’s why

review.headline_rewrite: Sterlite Technologies share price slumps over 7% despite stock market rally. Here’s why
bullets: Extending its losing streak for the six consecutive sessions, the small-cap stock slumped as much as 7.59% to ₹105.90 apiece on the BSE.
Szymanski and STI denied these allegations and asserted affirmative defenses.
At 10:05 AM, Sterlite Technologies share price was trading 2.53% lower at ₹111.70 apiece on the BSE.
